descriptionHtml:
[center][img] http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/4294/titulomo.jpg [/img] [/center]




[b][size=+1][color=coral] Check out it\'s matching armor at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10235 [/color][/size][/b]

_________________________________________________________________________________________


[b][color=#be2626][u]DESCRIPTON[/u][/color][/b]

A full HD retexture for the wonderful mesh made by MystikHybrid.

-New armored horse called Seraph.

-It is now independent and only the horse you summon will use the armor.

-All textures made from scratch in high resolution (4096 and 2048).

-Minor clipping problems fixed.

-Currently obtainable through console: Type [b][u] \"Help Seraph 4\" [/u][/b], copy the code found there and then type [b][u] \"Player.placeatme *code*\" [/u][/b].

-Once summoned, he will stay with you, teleport with you an act like any other normal horse. He\'s not esssential but regens health like Shadowmere, which makes him almost immortal except to extreme combat or high falls. He won\'t engage in combat and will get a few steps away if you do.


_________________________________________________________________________________________


[b][color=#be2626][u]VERSION HISTORY[/u][/color][/b]

[u]4/03/2012[/u]

-Added darker/rustier version for those who desire. You will find it under Miscellaneous tab. Downlad and install the main 4096 file, and then the darker version file. Overwrite when asked. 

[u]4/03/2012[/u]

Version 1.0

-4096 and 2048 versions added.

_________________________________________________________________________________________


[b][color=#be2626][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/color][/b]

Copy the data folder to your Skyrim directory. Activate TribalMightHorse.esp in your data files.

To uninstall delete all the files located at: 

-Skyrim/data/TribalMightHorse.esp
-Skyrim/data/textures/TribalMightHorse
-Skyrim/data/meshes/TribalMightHorse

_________________________________________________________________________________________


[b][color=#be2626][u]SPECIAL THANKS & CREDITS[/u][/color][/b]


-MystikHybrid for creating the wonderful horse armor I used as a base, and for allowing me to retexture and host his meshes.

-My girlfriend for all her support and patience, whose help has shown invaluable for finishing this armor. ;)

_________________________________________________________________________________________
author: Hairon
